price: “Ku izina rya Allah! Rwose twari mu buyobe bugaragara (ubwo twabasengaga).”
arabic: تَٱللَّهِ إِن كُنَّا لَفِي ضَلَٰلٖ مُّبِينٍ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: tal-lahi in kunnā lafī ḍalālin mubīnin
